name: Wonsteria
description:
After winning The 2nd Best Gameplay in INDIENESIA GAME FESTIVAL 2022. We are still on fire developing another Games to meet you.

Battle the creatures of this mysterious planet!

Play as a researcher sent to investigate the dangerous creatures of  the planet Wonsteria. Battle these mysterious and powerful monsters of Wonsteria as you gather their parts for research and more powerful gear. Wield a variety of weapons and survive whatever the planet can throw in your way.

Action-packed Combat

Battle against these creatures using a variety of weapons each with their own unique special effects and moves. Use these weapons while avoiding the powerful attacks that the monsters can use against you.

Craft your way to success

The monsters of this planet are made of materials stronger than ones you can find on earth, our earth weapons are of little use against them. Extract and use these monster’s materials to your advantage and craft new gear or upgrade whatever gear you currently have. 








Available on Windows and Mac (through the Itch.io App) with the notes of we are still developing for the next games!

Download & Install Instructions

Windows

  • Play in the browser, or
  • Download it and execute the .exe file!

Macbook 

  • Download https://itch.io/app
  • Search 'Wonsteria' and play it!

Game Control

  • Attack - Space / Mouse Left Click 
  • Dash - Left Shift / Mouse Right Click 
  • Interact - E

Thanks for playing our games and take a look around. We loved to see you playing through Twitter/Twitch/YouTube and surely we will repost your vids!
